review: I should have done my research. Even though kindle fire runs a version of android, amazon prevents easy use. Even with a android phone, video sometimes skips. There arent a lot of useful features for it. Everything plays netflix nowadays.. really wanted it to show photos stored on kindle onto tv.

review: This thing is awesome, you could cancel cable with it easily. I don't use it as often as I should. You can stream anything from your chrome browser on your computer, just waiting for them to add that extension to mobile.
author: Jacob  Mrozek

review: This thing is awesome. More and more apps keep adding casting and I'm running out of reasons to pay for my cable, particularly now that HBO and Showtime will offer web access only soon. Now if only I could get google fiber too.
author: Connor Zaleski
